comments.author: Dave
comments.body: I tried to keep up w/ Townie on the descent, but I was going so fast it made my teeth hurt (apologies to Davis Phinney). After staying w/ her for about a minute or so, I was forced to clamp down hard on the brakes and return to a more earthly, subsonic pace. It felt a little like re-entry. In fact the negative G's actually parted my hair neatly down the back. Looks kinda' cool, actually.

comments.author: Fuller
comments.body: Kudos to those in the pit crew and their assist. Will have to sacrifice this one to the 4Mile Gods up the canyon walls and revisit my destiny. Foiled but not forgotten, Trail-Rasta
